Molekel
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Molekel installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Molekel, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Molekel/5.4.0-Linux_x86_64
```
